title: Racing with the characters
review: James Mangold captures the race vertigo - in and out the track - in a unique exciting way. Bale and Damon are awesome!

title: A classic re-told
review: A classic story re-told in a magnificent way. Extra points for the awesome cast.

title: A Feast
review: Things like age, experience, talent and technology mixed perfectly and the result is a cinema feast.
